blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: theory: in this/next year, people gonna freak out because Phil or Dan will say something about suit on live or something. They...
question: theory: in this/next year, people gonna freak out because Phil or Dan will say something about suit on live or something. They will again assume, that they are getting married, because PJ is also going somewhere then! Only tumblr will just go crazy about this, the rest of internet probably remember, that Dan and Phil are (probably? they were on her birthday party this year I think?) close friends to Marzia and Pewdiepie. Stupid stuff like this seems to keep happening to them, then why not.
answer: I had to read this three times and I’m still not sure I’m reading it correctly. Are you saying there’s gonna be a repeat of that “Dan, Phil, PJ, and Louise all attended a wedding at the same time so it must have been Dan and Phil’s wedding” discourse from a couple years back?

reblog.comment: I had to read this three times and I’m still not sure I’m reading it correctly. Are you saying there’s gonna be a repeat of that “Dan, Phil, PJ, and Louise all attended a wedding at the same time so it must have been Dan and Phil’s wedding” discourse from a couple years back?

trail.content_raw: I had to read this three times and I’m still not sure I’m reading it correctly. Are you saying there’s gonna be a repeat of that “Dan, Phil, PJ, and Louise all attended a wedding at the same time so it must have been Dan and Phil’s wedding” discourse from a couple years back?
trail.content: I had to read this three times and I’m still not sure I’m reading it correctly. Are you saying there’s gonna be a repeat of that “Dan, Phil, PJ, and Louise all attended a wedding at the same time so it must have been Dan and Phil’s wedding” discourse from a couple years back?

blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: It really irritates me when people say things like “oh, 2012 was the BAD year when things were BAD and the phandom was BAD” as...
question: It really irritates me when people say things like “oh, 2012 was the BAD year when things were BAD and the phandom was BAD” as if were any better now. Like just because dnp stopped talking about the ship being irritating, doesn’t mean you guys aren’t being creepy as fuck. Cmon.
answer: Glad I missed the boat on 2012 honestly. If this blog existed back then I wouldn’t have been able to handle it.

reblog.comment: Glad I missed the boat on 2012 honestly. If this blog existed back then I wouldn’t have been able to handle it.

trail.content_raw: Glad I missed the boat on 2012 honestly. If this blog existed back then I wouldn’t have been able to handle it.
trail.content: Glad I missed the boat on 2012 honestly. If this blog existed back then I wouldn’t have been able to handle it.

summary: As much as I know it won’t happen, I can’t help but hope that we get at least a tiny hint that Dan and Phil are doing something...

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

summary: Famous, Not Because Of Youtube (5) Masterlist
title: Famous, Not Because Of Youtube (5) Masterlist
body:
part one, part two, part three, part four

Act Naturally (ao3) - AgingPhangirl (Madophelia)

Summary: Phil has a quiet life studying film at university and some small dreams of being a director he’s mostly ignoring, but his whole life is turned upside down when his roommate signs him up for a game show and he meets the famously arrogant movie star Daniel Howell.

A-Lister (ao3) - Tastefulcucumber

Summary: Phil’s Dad owns a small photography business. Daniel Howell, academy-award winning actor decides that Lester’s Portraits is the best place to get his head-shots for his portfolio. He expects to get his pictures taken, but what he doesn’t expect is the photographer’s son to be so captivating. No one else has treated Dan this normal since the beginning of his acting career. Maybe that’s just what Dan needs, a friend who is there for him, and not for his status.

Boy, Better Treat Me With Respect - phanetixs

Summary: the one where Phil hosts Late Late and Dan’s the one guest he really can’t shake off.

Class a Klutz (ao3) - bokeae

Summary: Dan’s an asshole who stars in high quality films and Phil’s just a clumsy idiot who has bad timing.

Famous (wattpad) - HelloAnonymousWriter

Summary: Dan has the best of both worlds (wink wink). He is the famous singer - Daniel James and he’s ordinary Dan Howell. He finally decides to tell his best friend and crush - Phil.

Fell In Love With You From The First Note - pasteldanhowells

Summary: Phil has always been entranced by the piano covers uploaded by howell music on YouTube, it was a daily routine of his to play covers of his favorite ghibli songs while getting ready in the morning. Imagine his shock when he finds the pianist sat in next to him in his English Class…

Give Me Some Of That Bass (ao3) - drxpdead

Summary: Playing music has always been a big part of Phil’s life. From the time he was five, and banging spoons against the table, to present day; seventeen years old and apart of the upcoming Alt. Rock/Everything-In-Between band, Heinous.

It’s an easy life to live, he’s sure. Making music with his best friends, trying to avoid failing high school the best he can, and getting his parents to stay off his back about ‘that God-awful noise’.

And there’s Dan Howell.

Incompetent (wattpad) - -phantasizing-

Summary: or the one where Dan’s a billionaire and Phil’s struggling to get by.

I Want It, I Got It (ao3) - Lilacskylester (princesslexi763)

Summary: Phil Lester was a worker for the BBC in London. Working in the advertising department, he was content being alongside his friend and fellow coworker PJ during every shift. However, the BBC is temporarily being used as a film set for a new movie staring Hollywood ‘It’ star, Daniel Howell. Being stuck as an extra on the set, Phil finds it’s hard to ignore the famous star. And maybe, just maybe, Dan finds it hard to ignore Phil as well.

Love Yourself - imnotinclinedtomaturity

Summary: A lot of things about Dan’s life are pretty great. He gets to make the music he wants, he’s got a great fanbase, and his manager is his best friend. A few things about his life suck a bit more. He’s currently lacking inspiration, he’s rather lonely, and he’s stuck in a rut.

Dan’s been going to the same coffee shop for years. It’s quiet, it’s quaint, it’s near his home. Most importantly: none of the employees give a shit that’s he a world-famous singer. Things change when he meets the new barista.

Prove It (wattpad) - StayStrongLittleLove

Summary: In which Phil is a famous movie actor and Dan is a flamboyant cutie who has had his heart broken more than once.

The Era of the Wingless Angel (ao3) - americanphancakes

Summary: The man, the myth, the legend! Singer-Songwriter Dan Howell is celebrating the 10th anniversary of his debut with a tell-all interview. How did his father’s departure from his life affect his songwriting? Why did his marriage to his background dancer fail? And are he and producer Phil Lester romantically involved? Tune in to find out.

The Human Requirement to Breathe - philsdrill

Summary: It’s a difficult life for Dan. Being famous and recognisable isn’t easy when you’re walking through a crowd of people… especially when you’re claustrophobic. Phil runs a coffee shop and an unusual customer ends up meaning more to him than he ever expected.

This Song Will End Happily (ao3) - quarterleigh

Summary: “Dan realises he’s in love on a chilly morning in April. There is dew on the grass and Phil is sliding around in his flip flops, too paranoid about stepping on an anthill to get a good shot of the sound check, and Dan is laughing. It’s a full belly laugh that has him hunched over the keyboard on stage at an outdoor amphitheatre. His manager is rolling his eyes at the both of them, a fond smile betraying his mask of annoyance, and Dan knows that he is in love.”

Dan is a Grammy Award-winning musician on a world tour. Phil is the videographer filming his concert documentary.

Up Close And Personal - pasteldanhowells

Summary: Dan is a famous dinosaur expert who has been studying dinosaurs his whole life, and gets the opportunity to work at Jurassic World (he works exclusively with the raptors). Phil is a very smart guy, like a genius, and he’s close friends with Louise who works at Jurassic World so he gets to go to Jurassic World and gets behind the scenes VIP treatment. There, he meets Dan. Unfortunately for Phil, things go wrong while feeding the raptors and an accident happens.

Voice On The Radio (wattpad) - cosmicbangtan

Summary: Dan should be old enough to know not to fall in love with the voice on the radio.

We’ll Figure This Out (ao3) - violently_knits

Summary: Dan Howell is in a rock band called Burn This City Down. When Phil Lester, the band’s manager, is assigned a bunk on his tour bus, they start to get closer and closer.

Yesterday (All My Troubles Seemed So Far Away) - phananddragonsfics

Summary: Daniel Howell, lead guitarist for the band The Tomorrows, is tired of his life in the spotlight and all the struggles that come with it. So, one night, he abruptly leaves his band in the middle of their tour and finds himself in a small town near Manchester, where he meets a group of people who seem to have no idea that Dan is a famous musician. Dan decides to use this to his advantage to pretend as though his fame doesn’t exist so he can be like a normal person. Will he be successful, or will his lying ways cause even more trouble to stir?

Your Biggest Fan - pasteldanhowells

Summary: Phil is in the middle of a world tour with his rock band Killing Daisies. They’ve only been on tour for a couple of weeks now and it’s their first time touring in America, so they are still getting the hang of things. One night, their tour bus breaks down in the middle of nowhere. Luckily, someone passes by who’s willing to help them. This someone just happens to be their biggest fan.

reblog.comment:
part one, part two, part three, part four

Act Naturally (ao3) - AgingPhangirl (Madophelia)

Summary: Phil has a quiet life studying film at university and some small dreams of being a director he’s mostly ignoring, but his whole life is turned upside down when his roommate signs him up for a game show and he meets the famously arrogant movie star Daniel Howell.

A-Lister (ao3) - Tastefulcucumber

Summary: Phil’s Dad owns a small photography business. Daniel Howell, academy-award winning actor decides that Lester’s Portraits is the best place to get his head-shots for his portfolio. He expects to get his pictures taken, but what he doesn’t expect is the photographer’s son to be so captivating. No one else has treated Dan this normal since the beginning of his acting career. Maybe that’s just what Dan needs, a friend who is there for him, and not for his status.

Boy, Better Treat Me With Respect - phanetixs

Summary: the one where Phil hosts Late Late and Dan’s the one guest he really can’t shake off.

Class a Klutz (ao3) - bokeae

Summary: Dan’s an asshole who stars in high quality films and Phil’s just a clumsy idiot who has bad timing.

Famous (wattpad) - HelloAnonymousWriter

Summary: Dan has the best of both worlds (wink wink). He is the famous singer - Daniel James and he’s ordinary Dan Howell. He finally decides to tell his best friend and crush - Phil.

Fell In Love With You From The First Note - pasteldanhowells

Summary: Phil has always been entranced by the piano covers uploaded by howell music on YouTube, it was a daily routine of his to play covers of his favorite ghibli songs while getting ready in the morning. Imagine his shock when he finds the pianist sat in next to him in his English Class…

Give Me Some Of That Bass (ao3) - drxpdead

Summary: Playing music has always been a big part of Phil’s life. From the time he was five, and banging spoons against the table, to present day; seventeen years old and apart of the upcoming Alt. Rock/Everything-In-Between band, Heinous.

It’s an easy life to live, he’s sure. Making music with his best friends, trying to avoid failing high school the best he can, and getting his parents to stay off his back about ‘that God-awful noise’.

And there’s Dan Howell.

Incompetent (wattpad) - -phantasizing-

Summary: or the one where Dan’s a billionaire and Phil’s struggling to get by.

I Want It, I Got It (ao3) - Lilacskylester (princesslexi763)
